node.excerpt: About a week ago I’ve released another version of SimpleConfigSections. It’s marked  and you can install it through . What is SimpleConfigSections? SimpleConfigSections is a little library that simplifies defining .net configuration sections. As you can see in the mentioned msdn documentation the amount of boilerplate…
